Constructor Detail

AdvancedSearchAjaxFacade

public AdvancedSearchAjaxFacade()
Method Detail

updateSearchTargetObject

public AjaxOutput updateSearchTargetObject(java.lang.String targetObjectClassName)
This method is called when the search target object is modified. Following tasks are done on this update- a. The dependent objects are identified and one default criteria is added for each of them to the criteriaParameters list. b. The attributes for each of these dependent objects are known through the advancedSearchUi object and hence the dropdown for the attributes is populated. c. The html is created using criteriaDetailsSection.jsp

updateAttribute

public AjaxOutput updateAttribute(java.lang.String attributeName,
                                  java.lang.String attributeLabel,
                                  java.lang.Integer index)
This method is called when an attribute is updated. Here we need to pass the possible operators in a list within the ajaxOutput value returned. While the html of the value column is returned through ajaxOutput's htmlContent.

deleteCriteria

public AjaxOutput deleteCriteria(java.lang.Integer index)
This method is called to delete a criteria. The deleted flag in advancedSearchCriteriaParameter object is set to true.

addCriteria

public AjaxOutput addCriteria(java.lang.String dependentObjectDisplayName)
This method is called to add a new criteria to a dependent object. The class name of the dependent object is passed as a parameter to this method.

Parameters:
dependentObjectDisplayName -
Returns:

getRowList

public AjaxOutput getRowList()

deleteSearch

public AjaxOutput deleteSearch(java.lang.String searchName)
This method is used to delete the search. The parameter passed to the method is the searchName of the search to be deleted.

saveSearch

public AjaxOutput saveSearch(java.lang.String searchName,
                             java.lang.String searchDescription)
This method is used to save the search. The parameters passed to the method are the searchName and the searchDescription entered by the user.

Returns:
